page.title: 15SERVICES TO WHITTONSTALL
page.content: BECAUSE WHITTONSTALL IS SO SMALL, THERE ARE NO SHOPS IN THE VILLAGE, IT IS ONLY VISITED BY TRAVELLING SHOPS OCCASIONALLY DURING THE WEEK. THERE IS NO POST OFFICE IN WHITTONSTALL, BUT THERE IS POSTAL COLLECTION AND DELIVERY EVERY DAY EXCEPT SUNDAY. THERE IS A POST BOX IN THE VILLAGE. THE MOBILE BAKER, BUTCHER. AND FISHMONGER VISIT THE VILLAGE ONCE A WEEK, AS DOES THE DUSTMAN. THE COAL MAN COMES TO THE VILLAGE FORTNIGHTLY. MILK AND NEWSPAPERS ARE DELIVERED TO THE VILLAGE DAILY.A MOBILE LIBRARY VISITS THE VILLAGE FORTNIGHTLY. THERE IS ONE TELEPHONE BOX FOR PUBLIC USE ,HOWEVER ONLY TWO HOUSES DO NOT HAVE A TELEPHONE. DOCTORS SURGERIES ARE UP TO 5MILES AWAY. .
